name: Game Design Dragon
description:
This is a game that has no replay-ability. The egg will drop from the sky so watch carefully. Use any key to move the dragon to the right.The dragon will reset on the left side of the screen if he goes to far to the right. Hit the egg 5 times with the dragon to win. Drop the egg and you lose.

Credit for the dragon sprite:https://www.spriters-resource.com/game_boy_advance/gs2/sheet/47003/ 

Credit for the egg : http://evilibrium.wikia.com/wiki/Dragon_Egg_(artifact)
